mdRecord.dcterms:title: Cows by Nose-Prints; 01 of 01
mdRecord.dcterms:description: 3. Doepner/Faulds--NotesItems 1-134--Clippings ScrapbookPage 12; "Identifying Cows by Nose-Prints"; To avoid substitutions, identity, or property disputes, farmers plan to nose-print the cows, which have yet to repeat pattern. The University of Minnesota is testing the method in their Division of Dairy Husbandry.; The Literary Digest; DF 654
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Identification
